entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -38.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 03:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -38.0°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -42.0°C
Wind: NNW 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 42 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill minus 58 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
